item.title: Recreating Proxmox Ve Xtermjs in Go
item.description: Part of a hobby of mine is running a home lab and using on Proxmox VE to do the virtualization. Since I work in the space I’m slowly trying to build tooling around Proxmox that will let me use the home lab full time for work. Usually my work involves building Kubernetes management tooling, you can imagine waiting for public cloud APIs all day can take away hours of your day at cost to your employer for both your time and the compute resources.
